2 #include "aliengo_dynamics_computer/force_transformer.hpp"
3 
4 forceTransformer::forceTransformer(/* args */)
5 {
6  //load all the variables
7  loadParams();
8 
9  tf_listener_ = new tf2_ros::TransformListener(tf_buffer_);
10  //initialize the synchronizer
11  foot_1_ = new message_filters::Subscriber<geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped>(nh_, foot_topics_[0], 1);
12  foot_2_ = new message_filters::Subscriber<geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped>(nh_, foot_topics_[1], 1);
13  foot_3_ = new message_filters::Subscriber<geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped>(nh_, foot_topics_[2], 1);
14  foot_4_ = new message_filters::Subscriber<geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped>(nh_, foot_topics_[3], 1);
15  footSynchronizer = new message_filters::Synchronizer<forceTransformer::footSyncPolicy>(forceTransformer::footSyncPolicy(10),
16  *foot_1_, *foot_2_, *foot_3_, *foot_4_);
17 
18  footSynchronizer->registerCallback(boost::bind(&forceTransformer::footSynchronizerCallback, this, _1, _2, _3, _4));
19  reaction_force_pub_ = nh_.advertise<aliengo_dynamics_computer::ReactionForce>("gazebo_leg_forces_components", 2);
20  foot_force_pub_ = nh_.advertise<aliengo_dynamics_computer::FootForces>("gazebo_leg_forces_magnitude", 2);
21 
22  ROS_INFO("Done initializing %s", ros::this_node::getName().c_str());
23 
24 }

27 {
28  //Empty Destruction
29 }

31 void forceTransformer::loadParams()
32 {
33  ros::NodeHandle nh("~"); //using private node handle
34  nh.param<std::string>("aliengo/base_frame", base_frame_, "base_link");
35 
36  //reading all the topics
37  nh.getParam("aliengo/foot_topics", foot_topics_);
38 
39  if(foot_topics_.size()!=4)
40  {
41  ROS_WARN("Only 4 topics are supported currently. Check the topics again. Shutting down now. Current size: %zu", foot_topics_.size());
42  ros::shutdown();
43  }
44 }
45 
46 void forceTransformer::footSynchronizerCallback(const geometry_msgs::WrenchStampedConstPtr& foot1, const geometry_msgs::WrenchStampedConstPtr& foot2,
47  const geometry_msgs::WrenchStampedConstPtr& foot3, const geometry_msgs::WrenchStampedConstPtr& foot4)
48 {
49  aliengo_dynamics_computer::ReactionForce component_reaction_forces;
50  aliengo_dynamics_computer::FootForces magnitude_forces;
51 
52  //transform force for every leg
53  transformForce(*foot1, component_reaction_forces, magnitude_forces.FL_foot);
54  transformForce(*foot2, component_reaction_forces, magnitude_forces.FR_foot);
55  transformForce(*foot3, component_reaction_forces, magnitude_forces.RL_foot);
56  transformForce(*foot4, component_reaction_forces, magnitude_forces.RR_foot);
57  ROS_INFO("Totatl Magnitude: %lf", (magnitude_forces.FL_foot+magnitude_forces.FR_foot+magnitude_forces.RL_foot+magnitude_forces.RR_foot));
58  ROS_INFO("--------------------------");
59 
60  //publish force
61  reaction_force_pub_.publish(component_reaction_forces);
62  foot_force_pub_.publish(magnitude_forces);
63 }
64 
65 geometry_msgs::TransformStamped forceTransformer::getTransformation(std::string source_frame, std::string target_frame)
66 {
67  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped transform;
68 
69  try{
70  transform = tf_buffer_.lookupTransform(target_frame, source_frame, ros::Time(0));
71  }
72  catch (tf2::TransformException &ex) {
73  ROS_WARN("%s",ex.what());
74  }
75 
76  return transform;
77 }
78 
79 tf2::Vector3 forceTransformer::getTransformedForce (geometry_msgs::TransformStamped transform, geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped foot_force)
80 {
81  //create rotation matix
82  tf2::Quaternion q;
83  tf2::Matrix3x3 rot_matrix;
84 
85  tf2::convert (transform.transform.rotation, q);
86  rot_matrix.setRotation(q);
87 
88  //create force vector
89  tf2::Vector3 force_vector(foot_force.wrench.force.x, foot_force.wrench.force.y, foot_force.wrench.force.z);
90 
91  tf2::Vector3 tf_force = rot_matrix*force_vector;
92  // ROS_INFO("X: %f Y: %f Z: %f", tf_force.getX(),tf_force.getY(), tf_force.getZ());
93 
94  return tf_force;
95 }
96 
97 void forceTransformer::transformForce(geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped foot_force, aliengo_dynamics_computer::ReactionForce& component_force, float& magnitude)
98 {
99  geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped transformed_force;
100 
101  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped curr_transform;
102  tf2::Vector3 force_vector;
103 
104  curr_transform = getTransformation(foot_force.header.frame_id, base_frame_);
105  force_vector = getTransformedForce(curr_transform, foot_force);
106 
107  transformed_force.header.stamp = curr_transform.header.stamp;
108  transformed_force.header.frame_id = foot_force.header.frame_id;
109 
110  transformed_force.wrench.force.x = force_vector.getX();
111  transformed_force.wrench.force.y = force_vector.getY();
112  transformed_force.wrench.force.z = force_vector.getZ();
113 
114  magnitude = std::sqrt(pow(force_vector.getX(),2)+pow(force_vector.getY(),2)+pow(force_vector.getZ(),2));
115  component_force.reaction_forces.push_back(transformed_force);
116 
117  ROS_INFO("Mag %s : %lf", foot_force.header.frame_id.c_str(), magnitude);
118 }
